Title: Outlaw
Writer: Graham Yost (developed for television by), Benjamin Cavell, Keith Schreier, Elmore Leonard (based on the short story 'Fire in the Hole' by), Ingrid Escajeda (executive story editor), VJ Boyd (story)
Actors: Timothy Olyphant, Nick Searcy, Joelle Carter, Jacob Pitts
Plot: Will Arlo reveal the identity of Drew Thompson to Raylan, or will he take the secret to his grave? Meanwhile, Boyd tricks the local mob and Wynn Duffy, and Colt is blackmailed over not killing Ellen May.
